title: Sun-dried tomato chicken pasta
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '4 skinless, boneless chicken breast fillets - cut into 3cm pieces', '4 cloves garlic, minced', '250ml double cream', '3/4 (290g) jar sun-dried tomato pesto', '1 (350g) jar roasted red peppers, drained and chopped', '50 - 80g chopped fresh basil', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper or chilli powder', '1 (500g) packet penne pasta']
